title: Unai Emery - Wikipedia
snippet: Emery was born in Hondarribia, Gipuzkoa, Basque Country. He is a native speaker of the Basque language. His father and grandfather, named Juan and Antonio respectively, were also footballers, both goalkeepers. The former appeared for several clubs in the second tier including Real Unión, while ...

title: Unai Emery - Aston Villa - Coach Profile
snippet: Unai Emery Etxegoien is a 54-year-old Football coach born in Hondarribia, Spain on 1971-11-03, who currently coaches Aston Villa, in England.

title: Aston Villa’s Unai Emery: Formed by a place of history, struggle and principle - The Athletic
